Recent Plenary Talks

List of GlueX talks

Exploring Meson Photoproduction with the GlueX Experiment , MESON 2023 (Matt Shepherd)

Meson Spectroscopy with GlueX , HADRON 2023 (Alexander Austregesilo)

Hadron spectroscopy at GlueX , IWHSS 2023 (Peter Hurck)

  • GlueXperiment
  • gluexexperiment
  • Glue_X

GlueX is a particle physics experiment located at Jefferson Lab in Newport News, VA. Its primary goal is to search for and study exotic hybrid mesons.
